author: zhaobenny
description: Human-like Discord reacts to messages powered by OpenAI
install_msg:
Quick startup guide: 
 1) Set (preferably paid account) OpenAI key using [p]set api openai api_key,INSERT_API_KEY 
 2) Use [p]aiemoteowner to see owner cmds, add a whitelisted channel as server admin using [p]aiemote allow <#channel> 
 3) Have users optin using [p]aiemote optin
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users. With user consent, chat messages may be forwarded to OpenAI or third parties to produce LLM responses. For further details, please consult: https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy, https://openrouter.ai/privacy, and relevant third-party privacy policies.
